pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, December 20, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, December 20, 2016:

Vancouver, British-Columbia

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour a towing-capable vessel with Canadian Coast Guard representatives

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


Media Appearances

1:00 p.m. – Live – Editorial board interview with the Vancouver Sun, to be streamed on Facebook live

2:15 p.m. – Live – Interview with News Talk 980 CKNW

3:05 p.m. – Live – Interview with News 1130


Note: All times are local.
